name: Nature Hater The Game - Join Dean the platypus & his grudge
blurb: Nature has dealt Dean a bum card and now he has a grudge. He is a freak, an egg-laying mammal, with a poisonous toe. Payback time!

rewards.reward: This guarantees you a copy of our game. So each time we hit our level milestones, you will get it for free. The more money we raise, the more levels we make, the more game you get for your Buck! You will also get our eternal gratitude.

Pledging \u00a32 or more will get you access to our private developers blog. Inside will be exclusive updates, preproduction and WIP art updates and direct access to our development team to ask questions and generally interact with the process.
Pledging \u00a33 will get you a beautiful Nature Hater badge, and all release points of our game for free! Plus access to our blog as with the \u00a32 reward.
Pledging \u00a37 will get you an awesome Nature Hater charm to dangle off your Android device. You will also be entitled to all release points of our game for free!
Pledging \u00a37.10 will get you an awesome, larger, Dean the platypus charm to dangle off your Android device. You will also be entitled to all release points of our game for free!

Your very own Nature Hater membership card with unique-to-you membership number which will unlock all secret items within the game, god mode and other Easter eggs. You will also be entitled to all release points of our game for free!

We have teamed up with Fonze.co.uk to supply Nature Hater t-shirts. Pledging \u00a320 gets you a Nature Hater t-shirt in black (if you are outside the UK, shipping costs will need to be added). You will also be entitled to all release points of our game for free! (S,M,L,XL)

Pledging \u00a325 will get you a special edition Fonze t-shirt which can only be obtained through the kickstarter scheme. It has been sourced using specific nature hater colours and they look amazing. You will also be entitled to all release points of our game for free! (S,M,L,XL)
Pledging \u00a339 will get you an ultra high quality Nature Hater hoody. You will also be entitled to all release points of our game for free! (S,M,L,XL)

Pledging \u00a345 will get you an original mounted sketch of Dean, signed, with any message you want. This sketch will be created by either Charlotte Wilcock or Adam Comiskey. You will also be entitled to all release points of our game for free!

Pledging \u00a360 will earn you a signed, custom, mounted, Dean the platypus sketch in a pose/action of your choice, with up to 2 other characters, created by one of our senior artists. You will also be entitled to all release points of our game for free!

Pledging at this level will get you one of everything in the lower packages. That is a Nature Hater badge, a Nature Hater charm, a Dean charm, unique membership card, a Nature Hater t-shirt, Special edition Fonze t-shirt, an original signed sketch of Dean, a Nature Hater hoody, a custom pose/action sketch of Dean PLUS a unique discount card at Fonze.co.uk PLUS you will also be entitled to all release points of our game for free!

When you pledge \u00a3225 you get a stunning sculpted Dean maquette. This amazing item will look awesome on your desk and a very rare item indeed. It will be moulded from the original sculpt and cast in resin. You will also be entitled to all release points of our game for free!

This pledge gets you the Dean sculpt and 1 of everything from the cheaper rewards. That is a Nature Hater badge, a Nature Hater charm, a Dean charm, unique membership card, a Nature Hater t-shirt, Special edition Fonze t-shirt, an original signed sketch of Dean, a Nature Hater hoody, a custom pose/action sketch of Dean PLUS a unique discount card at Fonze.co.uk, PLUS an amazing Dean sculpted maquette, PLUS you will also be entitled to all release points of our game for free!

Be in the game! We will invite you to send us photographs, so our senior artists can characterise you to feature as an enemy within the game. You will have the opportunity to approve the designs before they are implemented too. This would be an excellent gift for a game loving friend or family member. The artwork will be produced in high quality colour, framed and shipped to you. PLUS you will also be entitled to all release points of our game for free!

Visit the studio as a creative consultant and design your very own level for inclusion in the game. You will have unrestricted access to the chief artist and technical directors who will help implement your ideas. This is a superb opportunity to demonstrate your creative flare and exploit the creative resources at our studio. You will earn a professional credit along with a bunch of goodies from our merchandise, and a framed screen grab of your level. PLUS you will also be entitled to all release points of our game for free!

Have it your way. As creative director, you can direct us to reskin the entire demo your way. We will produce all artwork under your direction. This is the ultimate opportunity to make a game, plus we will publish the game online for the world to enjoy for free! You will get a copy of all pre-production concept art and creative notes from the production. This reward operates on a first come, first serve basis. Get in touch for scheduling.
